title: Channing Tatum's College Girlfriend Goes Viral After Jenna Dewan Announces Pregnancy
text:
Unearthed photos of Channing Tatum and his college girlfriend are going viral, just hours after his ex-wife, Jenna Dewan, announced she's pregnant with her boyfriend's child.

The snaps were shared by a fan, who stated her boyfriend's mother dated the actor before his fame at Glenville State College in Glenville, West Virginia.

my boyfriends mom dated Channing Tatum in high school and she found photos of them last night



shook pic.twitter.com/cIcSnmeJsn

— fath (@faiitthh33) September 23, 2019

In the snaps, Channing is seen hugging onto his sweatshirt wearing then-girlfriend.

The two smiled sweetly as he grabbed her from behind like a prom pose.

Video: Jenna Dewan Expecting Her First Child With Boyfriend Steve Kazee

In the other picture, he's crouching down next to a group of friends.

"my boyfriends mom dated Channing Tatum in high school and she found photos of them last night. Shook," the twitter user wrote. She later responded to her original tweet by clarifying it was actually in college.

View photos

Channing attended Glenville on a football scholarship, but later dropped out to pursue acting.

Interesting timing, considering his ex just revealed she's expecting baby #2.

Jenna Dewan shared the baby news with PEOPLE on Tuesday, announcing she and her Tony-winning broadway boyfriend, Steve Kazee, are expanding the family.

View photos

Jenna, who's been dating Kazee for less than one year, said they "are beyond overjoyed" for the new addition.

The "World of Dance" star is already Mom to 6-year-old daughter, Everly, who she shares with Channing.

They split in April 2018, but Jenna waited until October to file for divorce.
description: Unearthed Channing Tatum photos with his college girlfriend are making the rounds after his ex-wife Jenna Dewan announced she's pregnant with her boyfriend's child.
